name: Neopets - Bionicle Builder and the Happy n00b
description:
Bionicles invade Neopets and make comments. But beware the n00b!

Site theme.

Credit for sprites to Danska's Binoicle Builder

Also disables Nickelodeon bar. To get it back, remove coding .brand-mamabar{display:none;}

Chimoru by Dark709
